name: Hip Abduction Against Band
description: Activates and strengthens the hip abductors using resistance bands, focusing on lateral leg movement.

name: Hip Abduction Machine
description: Strengthens the outer thighs and glutes by performing hip abductions with machine resistance.

name: Side Lying Hip Abduction
description: Activates and strengthens the hip abductors, focusing on lateral leg movement.

name: Standing Cable Hip Abduction
description: Strengthens the hip abductors by moving the leg away from the body against cable resistance in a standing position.

name: Lateral Band Walks
description: Engages the hip abductors and glutes by stepping side to side with a resistance band around the legs.

name: Clamshells
description: Strengthens the hip abductors and glutes by opening and closing the knees while lying on the side.

name: Fire Hydrants
description: Engages the hip abductors and glutes by lifting one leg to the side while on all fours.

name: Curtsy Lunges
description: Targets the abductors and glutes by stepping one leg behind and across the other in a lunge movement.

name: Side Step-Ups
description: Strengthens the abductors and legs by stepping onto a bench or step from the side.

name: Side Plank with Hip Abduction
description: Combines side plank with lifting the top leg to engage abductors, glutes, and core.
